item.description:
Hi Everyone,
Im looking at the radar loop and its already raining down in parts of CT..,
its on its way..safer to can cell it...
besides its not fun to explore unless its nice and bright out anyway..
this is the site i use..
it may not work for you unless you have Java stuff loaded..but any weather station radar is good enough...

http://radar.weather....

Ok see you on the next one...

AL-r
